layout.title: swisstopo Toolbox
layout.footer: swisstopo Toolbox for processing addresses and coordinates

egid.label: EGID
egid.noResults: No address found with this EGID
egid.tooltip: Multiline input possible by copying addresses from the clipboard. Please ensure that each EGID is on a new line.

address.label: Address
address.tooltip: Multiline input possible by copying addresses from the clipboard. Please ensure that each address is on a new line.

coordinate.label: Coordinates
coordinate.tooltip: Multiline input possible by copying coordinates from the clipboard. Please ensure that each pair of coordinates is on a new line.

notifications.entryAlreadyExists: This entry {{address}} has already been added!
notifications.inputTooManyWords: The search must not contain more than 10 words.
notifications.inputTooLong: The search must not be longer than 4000 characters.

replaceDialog.title: Upload
replaceDialog.description: Entries already exist. Do you want to add new addresses or replace the existing ones?

tooManyDialog.title: Over 100 entries
tooManyDialog.description: So many entries significantly slow down the application. It is recommended to divide the work into several packages.

exampleFile.description: The file should contain one entry per line.
exampleFile.name: Example

resetDialog.title: Reset
resetDialog.description: Do you want to delete all entries?

dialog.title: Invalid entries found
dialog.description: There are invalid entries. Do you want these entries to be downloaded as well?

adminCHDialog.title: Continue to map.geo.admin.ch
adminCHDialog.description:
On the official Geoportal, you have full possibilities for further use of your addresses.

To do this, a .kml file will be downloaded, which you can then import into the map by dragging and dropping.

Thus, no addresses are stored online.

apiError.title: Server error
apiError.description: Error querying the data. Please try again later.
